name: Dead Road Racer 3D
description:
'Dead Road Racer 3D' is an action game that blends the boundaries of classic shooter games and timeless racing games. The rules are very simple - slay the endless waves of zombies or have your brain eaten. This is a survival race between living and dead.

When your hometown is overrun by the zombies, the only thing left to do soon becomes clear - drive your way through a zombie apocalypse! 'Dead Road Racer 3D' sees you not only driving your way through hordes of the walking dead, but allows you to shoot down the zombies using machine guns and RPGs equipped on the car. Is your vehicle strong enough for the challenges as your inevitable doom closes in around you? This game delivers some very funny cars and weapons!

Game Features:
- Intense zombie-blasting action and racing gameplay!
- 10 exciting weapons and 5 vesicles at your disposal
- Story mode and Endless mode with 7 relentless zombie types
- Stunning 3D graphics and inspiring soundtracks
